cards.title: Terminus
powers: {Terminus} deals herself 2 cold damage and 1 target 3 cold damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card now.
Each hero may use a power printed on one of their non-character cards. Then destroy any card whose power was used this way.

cards.title: Bone-Chilling Touch
body: A non-character target next to this card cannot have its current HP increased and cannot deal damage to {Terminus}.
Power: {Terminus} deals 1 target 2 cold damage. You may move this card next to that target.
powers: {Terminus} deals 1 target 2 cold damage. You may move this card next to that target.

flavorQuotes.text: I'm not here for you, but{BR}that doesn't mean I can't punch your{BR}ticket. Last chance. Get out of my way.

cards.title: Covenant of Wrath
body: When this card would be destroyed, you may remove 3 tokens from your Wrath pool. If you removed 3 tokens this way, prevent that destruction.
Power: {Terminus} deals 1 target 6 cold damage. Destroy this card.
powers: {Terminus} deals 1 target 6 cold damage. Destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Who among you{BR}can overthrow death itself?
Let's find out.

cards.title: Ethereal Armory
body: Each player may play an ongoing or equipment card now.
At the start of your next turn, return each of those cards that is still in play to its player's hand.

flavorQuotes.text: Kick it into gear, kids.{BR}Ether fades at sunrise.
I won't need long.

cards.title: Flash Before Your Eyes
body: At the end of your turn, select a trash pile and put a card from it on top of its associated deck.
You cannot select that trash pile again for this effect until this card leaves play.

flavorQuotes.text: I'm already paying{BR}for my mistakes. Stop{BR}making me relive them.

cards.title: Full Moon Express
body: Whenever {Terminus} is dealt damage by a non-hero target, she deals that target 2 melee damage. If Stained Badge is not in play, redirect damage dealt by non-hero targets to {Terminus}.
At the start of your turn, remove this card from the game.

flavorQuotes.text: I did not think that{BR}fear could survive death. But it{BR}comes for us along these rails.

cards.flavorReference: Kata Michi, End of the Line #20

cards.title: Graven Shell
body: This card is indestructible. If another Memento would enter play, instead remove it from the game and increase damage dealt by {Terminus} by 1.
Whenever {Terminus} destroys a card, add 2 tokens to your Wrath pool and she regains 1HP.
cards.flavorText: The bullet that should{BR}have killed Tang Daiyu became a{BR}powerful weapon against the ghosts{BR}she was tasked with hunting.

cards.title: Guilty Verdict
body: Whenever a hero target is dealt 3 or more damage, add 1 token or remove 3 tokens from your Wrath pool.
If you removed 3 tokens this way, increase damage dealt by that hero target by 1 until the start of the next environment turn.

flavorQuotes.text: You're dead, not doomed.{BR}What comes next is up to you.

cards.title: Immortal Coils
body: Power: {Terminus} deals 1 target 3 cold damage. Add 1 or remove 3 tokens from your Wrath pool.{BR}If you removed 3 tokens this way, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
powers: {Terminus} deals 1 target 3 cold damage. Add 1 or remove 3 tokens from your Wrath pool.{BR}If you removed 3 tokens this way, reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Outnumbered? I just wish there{BR}were more than five of you idiots.

cards.title: Jailbreaker
body: When this card enters play, add 3 tokens to your Wrath pool and destroy all other copies of Jailbreaker.
Power: {Terminus} deals herself 1 cold damage and any number of other targets 2 projectile damage each.
powers: {Terminus} deals herself 1 cold damage and any number of other targets 2 projectile damage each.

flavorQuotes.text: Nice gun.
Nice dress.

cards.title: No Rest For The Wicked
body: You may put a target from the villain trash into play. If that target has more than 5HP, reduce its current HP to 5. That target deals up to 2 other targets 5 infernal damage each.
If no target enters play this way, add 5 tokens to your Wrath pool.

flavorQuotes.text: Dust off and shut up.{BR}You work for me now.

cards.title: Railway Spike
body: This card is indestructible. If another Memento would enter play, instead remove it from the game and draw 4 cards.
Whenever {Terminus} is dealt damage, add 1 token or remove 3 tokens from your Wrath pool. If you removed 3 tokens this way, {Terminus} deals the source of that damage 3 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: <Show them no mercy.>
I'm a cop, not an executioner.

cards.title: Return Fire
body: Select a non-hero target. That target deals {Terminus} 1 projectile damage, then {Terminus} deals it 2 projectile damage.
You may draw a card.
You may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Thanks for the bullets.

cards.title: Searing Gaze
body: {Terminus} deals 6 cold damage to a target that dealt her damage since your last turn.
If a non-character target is destroyed this way, you may remove it and this card from the game.

flavorQuotes.text: Judgment time.

cards.title: Soul Ignition
body: Add 3 tokens to your Wrath pool.
You may use a power now.
You may discard a card. If you do, add 3 tokens to your Wrath pool or use a power now.

flavorQuotes.text: No mortal should{BR}enjoy being on fire that much.
It's creepy.

cards.title: Stained Badge
body: This card and {Terminus} are indestructible. If another Memento would enter play, instead remove it from the game. If all other heroes are incapacitated, the heroes lose.
At the end of your turn, add 1 token to your Wrath pool if {Terminus} has 1 or more HP.

flavorQuotes.text: This city's full of cops and{BR}crooks, but we were the worst of{BR}both. It's time to make things right.

cards.title: Stoke the Furnace
body: Draw 2 cards.
Increase damage dealt by {Terminus} by 1 until the start of your next turn.
Add or remove 3 tokens from your Wrath pool. If you removed 3 tokens this way, you may play a card.

flavorQuotes.text: <The train does not distinguish{BR}between passengers and fuel.>

cards.flavorReference: The Conductor, Book of the Dead #67

cards.title: The Chain Conductor
body: Reveal cards from the top of your deck until you reveal a Memento or Equipment card. Put it into play or into your hand. Shuffle the rest of the revealed cards into your deck.
If no card entered play this way, add 3 tokens to your Wrath pool and {Terminus} deals 1 target 2 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: <Welcome aboard, Officer Tang.{BR}We've got a long ride ahead of us.>

cards.title: The Light at the End
body: When this card enters play, put a one-shot from your trash into play.
At the end of your turn, you may remove 3 tokens from your Wrath pool. If you do, {Terminus} regains 2HP or destroys 1 ongoing card.

flavorQuotes.text: It's cute when they{BR}try to run at the very end.{BR}Pointless, but cute.

cards.title: Unusual Suspects
body: Add 2 tokens to your Wrath pool.
{Terminus} deals up to 2 targets 2 cold damage each. If {Terminus} deals damage this way to a target that shares a keyword with a card in any trash pile, increase that damage by 2.

flavorQuotes.text: Took it with him to{BR}his grave? Should have gone{BR}somewhere harder to follow.

promoCards.title: Terminus
powers: Remove X tokens from your wrath pool (up to 2). {Terminus} deals 1 target X+1 cold damage and regains X+1 HP.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may deal themselves 2 psychic damage to draw 2 cards.
Reveal the top 3 cards of a hero deck. Discard 2 of them and replace the other.

promoCards.title: Terminus
powers: Play a card. {Terminus} deals herself 2 cold damage.
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power now.
Each environment target deals itself 3 cold damage.
Reveal the top 2 cards of a non-villain deck. Replace them in the same order.
